term.title: coupling constant (spin-spin)

item.text: A quantitative measure for nuclear spin-spin, nuclear-electron (hyperfine coupling) and electron-electron (fine coupling in EPR) coupling in magnetic resonancespectroscopy. The 'indirect' or scalar NMRcoupling constants are in a first approximation independent of the external magnetic field and are expressed in Hz.
